title: A Bike, a birthday
brief_description: Almost every young child longs for a shiny new bike. One youngster, Jay, wishes for and has a marvellous adventure in his dream about this prize possession. But until the morning of his birthday, Jay doesn’t know whether or not his birthday gift is the treasured first bike. Suitable for primary school level.
